alert.note: Alert for Matanuska Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 14 at 5:50AM AKST until December 14 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY EAST OF WASILLA... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Matanuska Valley east of Wasilla, including Palmer and Butte. * WHEN...Until noon AKST today. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of locally dense fog have formed from the junction of the Glenn and Parks Highway east to Palmer and Butte. Areas of fog also extend south along the Glenn Highway toward Chugiak and Birchwood. These areas of fog will continue through noon today.
info.instruction: A dense fog advisory means visibilities will frequently be reduced to less than one quarter mile. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
